      • withLocalIdeographFontFamily

        @NonNull
public MapSnapshotter.Options withLocalIdeographFontFamily(java.lang.String fontFamily)
        Set the font family for generating glyphs locally for ideographs in the 'CJK Unified Ideographs' and 'Hangul Syllables' ranges.

        The font family argument is passed to Typeface.create(String, int). Default system fonts are defined in '/system/etc/fonts.xml' Default font for local ideograph font family is MapboxConstants.DEFAULT_FONT.

        Parameters:
        fontFamily - font family for local ideograph generation.
        Returns:
        the mutated MapSnapshotter.Options

      • withLocalIdeographFontFamily

        @NonNull
public MapSnapshotter.Options withLocalIdeographFontFamily(java.lang.String... fontFamilies)
        Set a font family from range of font families for generating glyphs locally for ideographs in the 'CJK Unified Ideographs' and 'Hangul Syllables' ranges.

        The font families are checked against the default system fonts defined in '/system/etc/fonts.xml'. Default font for local ideograph font family is MapboxConstants.DEFAULT_FONT.

        Parameters:
        fontFamilies - font families for local ideograph generation.
        Returns:
        the mutated MapSnapshotter.Options
